#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

//freopen("input10.txt","r",stdin);
int t,n,p,q,n1,n2;
int i,j;
int sum,sum1=0,sum2=0;
cin>>t;
for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
{
    sum1=0;sum2=0;
    cin>>n;
    cin>>p;
    cin>>q;
    for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
    {
      cin>>n1;
      cin>>n2;
      sum1=sum1+abs(p-n1);
      sum2=sum2+abs(q-n2);
      sum=sum1+sum2;
    }
    cout<<(2*sum)<<endl;
}
}
